name: Comlinkdata
desc: Comlinkdata directly tracks US broadband subscriber switching and flow share between ISPs. Data tracks residential switching between all ISP types (ILEC, MSO, overbuilders, satellite, WISPs, and municipal) at a granular geographic level.
full_ticker_coverage: CNSL, CTL, FTR, T, VZ, WIN, ATUS, CABO, CHTR, CMCSA , SATS, VSAT, WOW
full_sector_coverage: US residential broadband: telco, MSO/cable, overbuilder, satellite, wireless ISP
use_cases: Fundamental analysis of residential broadband carriers
